name: Efec and Death - The Free Horror Game
name_original: Efec and Death - The Free Horror Game
description:
Not for the faint of hearted! Are you ready for adventure?

In this week's Pulp Horror you are a vampire named Efec, who was awoken from his grave by a strange man in a cloak. The man asks you to find Death and kill him, in return he will lift the curse that holds you to the graveyard. Nothing will prepare you for what happens next when Efec enters the forest, weak and unprepared.

This is classic horror, featuring a great soundtrack, visuals and sound effects. Lots of hidden mysteries to be discovered and solved.

If you like scary games, horror games, thriller games you will love this one! It is the adventure of the century

We're on Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr and Facebook!
